Class TextUserInterface

  • java.lang.Object
    • TextUserInterface
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    UserInterface

    public class TextUserInterface
extends java.lang.Object
implements UserInterface
    Contains all the methods that allow the program to interact with the user.

      • displayIndicators

        public void displayIndicators(java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> indicators)
        Prints out the indicators for the guess the user just made.

        Specified by:

      • displayGuess

        public void displayGuess(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> guess)
        Displays the guess passed in.

        This method is used when there is a computer codebreaker so that the human watching can see the computer's guesses.

        Specified by:
        displayGuess in interface UserInterface
        Parameters:
        guess - The guess made by the computer.

      • displayNumOfPegs

        public void displayNumOfPegs(int numOfPegs)
        Prints to the screen the length of the code.

        This is used when the player mode is either Computer v Computer or Human v Human, as the codebreaker did not choose the length of the code.

        Specified by:
        displayNumOfPegs in interface UserInterface
        Parameters:
        numOfPegs - The length of the code that has been made.
